signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to support their customer service agents without replacing them, but is unsure if the product can facilitate this.
signals.customer_ask: They want to make it easy for their customer service agents to provide support.
signals.context: Small team in beta testing phase, focusing on content creators.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the lack of support for voice notes, which are becoming a common communication method.
signals.customer_ask: They want to know if voice notes can be supported.
signals.suggested_solution: They implied a need for a system that can convert voice notes to emails.
signals.context: Small team in beta testing phase, focusing on content creators.

signals.problem_statement: The customer cannot access performance analytics without upgrading from the free tier.
signals.customer_ask: They want to know how to monitor performance without upgrading.
signals.context: Small team in beta testing phase, focusing on content creators.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the limitations of the free tier, particularly regarding the knowledge base functionality.
signals.customer_ask: They want to know if they can use an AI-enabled knowledge base.
signals.context: Small team in beta testing phase, focusing on content creators.
